DevRules is a powerful CLI tool designed to automate and enforce development guidelines, helping teams maintain high-quality code standards and accelerate onboarding processes.

## Documentation Sections

### [Overview](overview/one-pager.md)
General information about DevRules, including the changelog and one-pager.

### [For Decision Makers](decision-makers/comparison.md)
Business-focused content including comparisons with other tools.

### [Enterprise](enterprise/enterprise-build.md)
Advanced features for enterprise deployments, including custom builds and distribution guides.

## Quick Start

To get started with DevRules, visit the [main README](https://github.com/pedroifgonzalez/devrules/blob/main/README.md) for installation and basic usage instructions.
